amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to revise Title III, Part 3, Election Infrastructure Innovation Grant Program, to include an emphasis on increasing voter participation, engage the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), and increase funding for the competitive grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lujan amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Lujan.
